pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, December 4, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Quebec City, Quebec

1:15 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Quebec City, Régis Labeaume. Leader of the Government in the House of Commons and Quebec Lieutenant, Pablo Rodriguez, will also attend.

Salon de la mairie
Hôtel de ville de Québec
2, rue des Jardins

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

2:15 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with Quebec’s Minister of International Relations and La Francophonie, Nadine Girault. Leader of the Government in the House of Commons and Quebec Lieutenant, Pablo Rodriguez, will also attend.

Édifice Hector-Fabre
4e étage
525, boulevard René-Lévesque Est

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.

3:15 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with Quebec’s Minister of Justice  and Minister Responsible for Canadian Relations and the Canadian Francophonie, Sonia LeBel. Leader of the Government in the House of Commons and Quebec Lieutenant, Pablo Rodriguez, will also attend.

Édifice Honoré-Mercier
1025, rue des Parlementaires

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to present themselves at the main entrance no later than 3:00 p.m.
